description:
nova is not sending fake connectors to cinder any longer, so on cinder side, DS8K driver can remove related code in terminate_connection.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1609984
title: DS8K: remove code for fake connector

comments.content:
nova is not sending fake connectors any longer, so DS8K can remove related code in terminate_connection.

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/cinder 11.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
